mapper.insert: insert into placereply (score, rno, reply, replyer, bno) values (#{score}, seq_placere.nextval, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{bno})
mapper.update: update placereply set score = #{score}, reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from placereply where bno = #{bno}
select score from placereply where bno = #{bno}
